ðŸ“– Summary: Doodle is a pure Kotlin UI framework for building web and desktop applications. It provides an intuitive render model, making it easy to create complex UIs with pixel-level precision and layouts. The framework supports Kotlin/JS, Kotlin/Wasm, and Kotlin/JVM, enabling cross-platform development.
